member.name: T:SE.Core.Models.BuildingDTO
member.summary: A physical building, which is either a school or a district. When IsSchool is true, the DistrictName, DistrictCode, SchoolName, and SchoolCode will all be populated. When IsSchool is false, the SchoolName and SchoolCode will be empty. When it is a school,

member.name: P:SE.Core.Models.BuildingDTO.IsSchool
member.summary: Whether the building is a school or a district

member.name: P:SE.Core.Models.BuildingDTO.SchoolName
member.summary: The OSPI name of the school, if IsSchool is true, otherwise an empty string.

member.name: P:SE.Core.Models.BuildingDTO.SchoolCode
member.summary: The unique OSPI code for the school, if IsSchool is true, otherwise an empty string.

member.name: P:SE.Core.Models.BuildingDTO.DistrictCode
member.summary: The unique OSPI code for the district

member.name: P:SE.Core.Models.BuildingDTO.DistrictName
member.summary: The OSPI name for the district
